scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:popup && pnpm run build:read-page-content && pnpm run build:background && pnpm run copy:html
scripts.watch: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:popup --watch=forever & pnpm run build:read-page-content --watch=forever & pnpm run build:background --watch=forever & pnpm run copy:html --watch=forever
scripts.start: echo "Run 'pnpm run watch' for development build, then load the 'dist' folder in your browser extension page."
